reviews.text:
🌿Incorporated as a part of the Active, Beautiful Clean Waters (ABC Waters) programme, Floating Wetlands are not only aesthetically pleasing but also improve water quality by filtering pollutants and absorbing harmful nutrate and phosphates present in the water as nutrients through their roots system.
☘️🪻🐌At the same time, Floating Wetlands create a conducive environment for wildlife to thrive, enhancing the biodiversity.
🐚🍀It's an essential part in enhancing the reservior's water quality, enriching it's ecological biodiversity while adding an attractive appeal to the overall environment.
